fields.caption: Alex Maddalena, 79, at an appointment with Dr. Karen Becerra of the Gary and Mary West Senior Dental Center in San Diego. Mr. Maddalena went to the clinic in January for his first check-up in five years.

Brenda Ojeda, right, and Dr. Karen Becerra, left, discussing a crown for Alex Maddalena, 79, at the Gary and Mary West Senior Dental Center in San Diego. After not seeing a dentist for five years, Mr. Maddalena had to have three teeth extracted in January.
